минус нервы
минус мораль
невозможно играть за выжившего

- минус игра

Hallo,

Ich bin bei Reviews nie der große Redner also mache ich es kurz und knapp. 
Dieses Spiel ist der absolute Hammer! Die Devs balancieren das Spiel langsam mehr und mehr der erste Schritt dazu war das neue Emblem/Ranking System. Jetzt wird es auch was bedeuten einen hohen Rang zu erreichen. Es gibt viele verschiedene Killer und Survivor was den Spielspaß nie verschwinden lässt! Jeder Survivor hat seine eigenen persönlichen Perks, die aber mithilfe des erreichens der Level 30/35/40 oder des Schreins auch für alle anderen Survivor verfügbar sind. Das gleiche ist mit allen Killern.
Das einzige wirklich negative ist, dass durch das neue Ranking System fast jeder 3. Killer ein Camper ist teilsweise sogar ein Facecamper was den Spielspaß vermießt. 
Sonst ist das Spiel wirklich top habe nichts auszusetzen!

Update: Nach nun über 2000 Spielstunden(habe einen anderen Account für dbd) kann ich hinzufügen, dass das game langsam langweilig wird. Red Ranks sind anstrengend, viele Perk bugs(Dead Hard), zu viel wird generft. 
Außerdem bei jedem patch gibt es sogenannte 'Map-Holes' ein Beispiel dazu hier: https://www.twitch.tv/evoz__/clip/LazyRoughCrowOpieOP?filter=clips&range=all&sort=time
Das schlimme daran: Wenn man ein neuer Killer ist, weiß man nicht, dass es sowas gibt und dass dann vielleicht Survivor ohne dass die gens gemacht wurden oder die Luke erscheint einfach rauskommen da fragt man sich schon, wie das jetzt passiert ist.
Das meist negativste mittlerweile, ist die Community.
Dead by Daylight hat eine der toxischsten Community's die ich je gesehen habe. Nicht mal in COD gibt es so eine!
Abgesehen von dem schlechten, gibt es aber auch gute Sachen!

Wie z.B. das neue Archive. Es funktioniert wie ein Battle Pass(ich denk ma jeder kann sich darunter was vorstellen). Was dir ermöglicht, Accessoires zu bekommen, die es wahrscheinlich in dieser Farbe/Form nicht mehr geben wird. Zu dem wurde die Nurse generft die einst der stärkste Killer im game war was auch ganz gut ist trotzdem hätte man die Nurse nicht so demütigen dürfen, devs ;) Auch ich war ein Nurse Main.

Nach wie vor kann ich das game empfehlen wer sich dafür interessiert. Aber glaubt mir, wenn ihr in den Red Rank Bereich kommt(Rank 1-4) werden die Runden sehr, sehr stressig und ihr werdet auch den einen oder anderen Rage moment haben, sagt mir nicht ich habe euch nicht gewarnt ;)

Sonst sage ich noch: good luck and have fun fellow player of the fog! :)
暇つぶしで１０００時間もしてしまうほど中毒性があります
прекрасная игра мне очень нравится всем советую

Game started off as a lot of fun.

Update by update, the development crew seems to listen only to the top 5% of players who have 5000+ hours when it comes to updates.

Lets be real, not all of us are top 5%...

So the endless killer/survivor battle of this ones better than the other purely relies on the top 5%.

Needless to say after the last update, Previously i was rank 6, I can't even get below rank 20.  This is me getting 15k bloodpoints plus.  Pallets were shrunk to near non existant.  Can't even escape through windows anymore.  And any response you ask for all you get is "get good".  Well sadly enough not all of us are top tier 1000 hours into this game.   Start listening to the real majority of players and stop listening to the killers who rank up super fast into the top 5%.

I rarely write reviews, but after a couple hundred hours into this game, i regret buying it. 

The community is straight up toxic, if a killer doesn't kill all 4 survivors a "gg" is few and far between.

And if you do survive and make it out, you don't even get to rank up a pip.  Even if you hauled !@# getting generators running.

Balance for this game is WELL overdue, and the community refuses to admit it.  I personally have held off purchasing the addons as i see them as a waste of money at this point.

If you want to be shafted by admins every step of the way, then this is the game for you!  If you want a community of killers that will automatically assume you have a group of 4 overly qualified players on survive with friends.  This is for you!

In reality as not every killer realizes, sometimes when you queue as 3 friends, you get a brand new survivor that isn't a pro.  They bring your entire team down to their level (which is perfectly fine).  However the community of killers automatically assume every player should be a pro.

买了很久但一直没玩，在一次机会从新拾起起后，发现已经与当初大有不同。
在黎明杀机（鸡）中，玩家将扮演牺牲者（人类）或屠夫，在一个浩瀚的农场中（还有几个室内图）的分秒追逐。
砰砰乱吵的心跳声（刚开始玩真的吓死了），以及相当配合环境的背景音乐，在地图（还算大）中享受一个多元素的躲猫猫（？），玩法多样性，砸板，修发电机，开门逃脱（迷路，被吓死），加上每一位角色和屠夫的技能让整个游戏充满变化。
因此推荐所以热爱小刺激中寻找欢乐的小伙伴们下手啦！！
画质不错，网络要加速器（我从来没有没用过），因为【第五人格】最近杀机好像又火了。

Juego totalmente desbalanceado y desastrozo por parte de los devs. El juego esta completamente desbalanceado del lado del survi, 1 survi solo , sin perks, ni items puede rushearte todos los motores en 7 min... ahora pongamos en la mesa 4 survis con perks que potencian esto mismo y de paso conectados via discord mayormente, y si quieren 1 o 2 cajas de herramientas..... (el boludo de turno dice es por que sos malo etc) bueno ahora metamos justamente toda la perdida de tiempo que tiene el killer. Entre estas cosas son ir como pollo sin cabeza por el mapa hasta encontrar 1 survi, siguiente paso perseguir al survi hasta darle el primer hit, tercer paso darle el segundo hit para derribarlo y por ultimo cuarto paso tener que levantarlo y llevarlo a un hook... ahora saquen ustedes las cuentas de cuanto tiempo tenemos para cuidar nuestros estupidos generadores(?

So, you are thinking about getting Dead by Daylight right? Well, I am here to tell you how great this game actually is.

First of all, if you are scared of horror movies and the genre itself, this game is fine for you. Personally I hate horror movies and I can't really watch them, but I can play this game just fine and still have a great time with intense gore. Also, something I would like to point out is don't let the bad reviews about bad balancing issues ruin the game for you. However, they are partly right. Not every killer in the game is good, in fact there are only three top tier killers (Hillbilly, Nurse, Myers.) Survivors can have ridiculously good perks, but the killer can as well. Trust me, anyone who is saying killer is impossible to play is completely wrong. There are plenty of perks that are amazing on killer, here is a few: BBQ & Chili (This basically lets the killer see any survivors that aren't near the recently hooked survivors), Nurse's calling (Let's you see the aura of healing survivors from about 20/24/28 meters away), and NOED or No one escapes Death (When the exit gates are powered, a dull totem is turned into a hex totem that makes it so survivors are one hit, so the killer can just hook everyone before they escape.) I know if you are reading this review, you may have no idea what I am talking about and thats ok. This game has some bugs, everyone knows that, but so do other games. There isn't a single game out there that is absolutely perfect and has no bugs. In the end, I feel like this game was very worth my $20 and I hope to keep improving as I keep playing this game.

IMPORTANT: If you are worried about the hefty amount of DLC for this game, don't worry. The devs are implenting a way to unlock DLC characters by playtime, so you won't have to pay to get them.

Don't ever buy this game if you value your time or mental health. I've not ever played a game with such toxicity built into the actual mechanics of the game. I keep returning to play it after long hiatuses, because the core gameplay and concept is quite good - and then I quickly remember why I stopped playing it.

Do you want to play a game where players can bring consumables that dramatically alter the balance of the game, making it extremely unfair from before the match even loads? Do you want to play a game where one player can choose to single out and completely ruin another player's experience and wasting their time, with no consequences? Do you want a game with no functional reporting system, allowing people to cheat freely, flame others in chat, and hold the game hostage with no consequences? Do you want to play a game in which the developers consistently ignore balance issues and genuinely broken game-breaking issues in favor of pushing more paid DLC out? Do you want to play a game where the grind would be more at home in a F2P/P2W game? If you do, then I highly recommend you check out Dead by Daylight.

Do yourself a favor and find literally anything else to play.

For what it is, a horror game that simulates both the hunter and the hunted, this game is very good and very fun, but...

It SUCKS being a new player. Veteran players already have a HUGE advantage over new players in mastering the mechanics and maps of the game, but as a new player you're going up against people who ALSO have full perk setups when you're starting out with none (in beginner matches). If this company wants to net-gain rather than net-lose players they would be well advised to try and bring a little more equity to the new/early player experience. Perhaps implement perk limitations by match Rank (1 perk max for Rank 16-20, 2 perks for Rank 11-15, 3 perks for Rank 6-10, 4 perks for Ranks 1-5) to help make low rank matches more competitive rather than the bloodpoint farm they often seem to be for veteran players.

I'm recommending this game but with a WARNING to new players. Just go in expecting to get crushed (and sometimes trolled) for your first many games and you'll have more and more moments that are remarkably fun in a way that is unique to this game.

*EDIT*
Since my review, there have been some updates to the way matchmaking and ranking occurs that help remedy my earlier complaint about early matches being unrelentingly imbalanced for the new player. The situation has changed for the better. The developer has also been very timely with the release of new costumes, maps, killers and survivors which is admirable.

Il vaut son prix, les mis à jours sont régulières, et si le jeu vous plaît autant qu'à moi libre à vous d'investir dans les nombreux dlc disponible (Il semblerait que dans un futur proche, des contenus de dlc tels que les tueurs de licences pourront être obtenu en jouant). Il est préférable de jouer avec des amis pour optimiser son expérience de jeu en tant que survivant, vous passerez pour sûr de bons moments.

Ridiculously addicting. Love it and love to hate it.

IMO:
- Killers shouldn’t be allowed to camp
- Dedicated servers would help with really dumb lag moments and ridiculously hard to judge hitboxes.
- Survivors shouldn’t be able to be hurt while vaulting
- You shouldn’t vault back over a pallet when facing away from it.
- You shouldn’t pull down a pallet and be pulled to the killers’ side of the pallet.

A lot of fun regardless of issues.
